com.mumfrey.liteloader.core

Class LiteLoaderEventBroker<TClient,TServer extends MinecraftServer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.LiteLoaderEventBroker<TClient,TServer>
  • Type Parameters:
    TClient - Type of the client runtime, "Minecraft" on client and null on the server
    TServer - Type of the server runtime, "IntegratedServer" on the client "MinecraftServer" on the server
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterfaceProvider, Observer, ShutdownObserver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LiteLoaderEventBrokerClient

    public abstract class LiteLoaderEventBroker<TClient,TServer extends MinecraftServer>
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterfaceProvider, ShutdownObserver
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith
